sub_domain: Factions & Sects (Gu-pa / Nine Great Sects or Five Sacred Mountains)

faction_profile.name: 형산파 (Mount Heng Sect / 衡山派)
alias: The Solitary Beauty of the South (오악독수 / 南岳獨秀)

location.mountain: Mt. Heng (형산 / 衡山) - Composed of 72 peaks.
location.climate: Warm and scenic, located furthest south among the Five Sacred Mountains.

status.alliance_role: Core member of the Five Sacred Mountain Sword Sects (Oh-ak Geom-pa).
status.ranking: Often considered #2 in recognition within the Five Mountains (after Mount Hua), but sometimes excluded from the 'Nine Great Sects' depending on the author.
status.cultural_significance: A joint sanctuary for Buddhism and Taoism, and the birthplace of the Huxiang School (Neo-Confucianism).

heritage.mythology: Resting place of Zhurong (God of Fire / 축융). Associated with Sung Heuk-ho from 'Investiture of the Gods'.
heritage.literature: Background for 'The Cloud Dream of the Nine' (Guunmong) and associated with poets like Du Fu and Zhu Xi.

characteristics.philosophical_blend: Harmonious fusion of Confucianism, Buddhism, and Taoism.

key_elements: Mist & Cloud: Sword techniques that confuse the enemy like shifting clouds.
Sound & Vibration: Often associated with music (Zither/Flute) in some settings.
Fire: Secret techniques related to the Fire God Zhurong.
combat_style.signature_visual: Returning Wind and Falling Geese (visualizing the wind and birds).

signature.name: 칠십이식 회풍낙안검 (72-Style Returning Wind Falling Wild Goose Sword)
signature.description: The most famous technique. A dazzling display of speed and change, mimicking a goose landing in a whirlwind.

illusion_arts: 백변천환 형산운무십삼검 (100 Changes 1000 Illusions Mt. Heng Mist 13 Sword)
fire_arts: 축융검법 (Zhurong Fire God Sword) - Heavy and destructive, contrasting with their usual style.

list: 구전일기혼원공 (Nine Turn One Qi Mixed Origin Art)

narrative_role: The artistic rival to Mount Hua (Sword vs Sword).
A sect that provides 'Mystery' or 'Illusion' elements to the story.
Often portrayed as neutral or scholarly, avoiding dirty political fights.
The stage for events involving the 'Fire God's Treasure' or ancient musical scores.
